visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D column chart with the title 'Stereographic chart'. The chart should have two data series with specific data points. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The chart should also include custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as 3D options and plot options.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D column chart with the title 'Stereographic chart'. The chart type is set to 'column', and 3D options are enabled with specific angles (alpha and beta), depth, and view distance. The plot options for the column series include disabling grouping, setting depth, and adjusting group Z padding. The y-axis title is set to null, and the chart includes two data series with specific data points. Custom colors are applied to the series for visual distinction. Additional configurations include the frame's bottom color and size.
